snippet: More than six million euros, or nearly $8 million, were traced in undeclared assets in the bank accounts of four relatives of a former finance minister, George Papaconstantinou.
abstract: Greece’s financial crimes squad traces more than six million euros, or nearly $8 million, in undeclared assets in bank accounts of four relatives of former finance minister George Papaconstantinou.
lead_paragraph: More than six million euros, or nearly $8 million, were traced in undeclared assets in the bank accounts of four relatives of a former finance minister, George Papaconstantinou.

headline.main: Greece: Ex-Official’s Relatives Fined for Bank Deposits
headline.print_headline: Greece: Ex-Official’s Relatives Fined for Bank Deposits
